channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Agent

item.title: CVE-2023-45246|2024-09-19T18:30:05.159Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20cloud%20agent
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure and manipulation due to missing authorization. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Agent (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 36343.
